fields.description: The above testcases fail due to a {{NullpointerException}} and a Cannot bind to port.. Both of which should be fixed..
fields.summary: Migrate TestClientToAMTokens and TestClientRMTokens tests from the old RPC engine

comments.body: [~asuresh] would you attach the failed build jenkins url? May this was ignored in some of the patch because these test class were failing consistently for long time with UnknownHostException. Issue is HADOOP-12687

It looks like this has been happening from https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-Yarn-trunk-Java8/1498/
Right after HADOOP-12579 was committed..
Uploaded a patch to fix TestClientToAMTokens.
TestClientRMTokens doesn't fail in my environment.

+1 on the latest patch and will commit it in few days unless receiving some concerns.
